Laplace Mechanism.description: The Laplace mechanism adds noise drawn from a Laplace distribution to ensure differential privacy.
Laplace Mechanism.use_case: Used to provide privacy guarantees when querying sensitive datasets, primarily for numerical data.

file.description: The input CSV file containing the tabular data to be anonymized.

column_to_be_anonymized.description: The name of the column with numerical data that requires anonymization.

direct_identifier_columns.description: A list of columns that serve as direct identifiers.

sensitivity.description: The sensitivity of the query, representing the maximum change in the output caused by the inclusion or exclusion of a single record.

epsilon.description: Privacy budget that controls the level of noise added.
